page.description: Retrieves the syntax handler source for a particular syntax name.
page.syntax: Script as C = .GetDefaultSyntaxHandlerScript( [ SyntaxName as C ] )

argument.name: SyntaxName
argument.description: Optional. The name of a syntax.

page.discussion: The GetDefaultSyntaxHandlerScript()method retrieves the syntax handler source for a particular syntax name. If you do not pass a name, the function returns the default script for the current syntax type. This script does not include any overrides previously set by calling the SetSyntaxHandlerScript() method.
